description: Detects a Windows command and scripting interpreter executable started from Microsoft Outlook
name: Microsoft Outlook Product Spawning Windows Shell
query: (process.parent.executable:*\\OUTLOOK.EXE AND process.executable:(*\\cmd.exe OR *\\powershell.exe OR *\\wscript.exe OR *\\cscript.exe OR *\\sh.exe OR *\\bash.exe OR *\\scrcons.exe OR *\\schtasks.exe OR *\\regsvr32.exe OR *\\hh.exe OR *\\wmic.exe OR *\\mshta.exe OR *\\msiexec.exe OR *\\forfiles.exe OR *\\scriptrunner.exe OR *\\mftrace.exe OR *\\AppVLP.exe OR *\\svchost.exe OR *\\msbuild.exe))
author: Michael Haag
Florian Roth
Markus Neis
Elastic
FPT.EagleEye Team
